mapper.select: SELECT pro_no proNo, pro_cate proCate, pro_name proName, pro_price proPrice, pro_detail proDetail, img_no imgNo FROM SHOP_PRODUCT WHERE pro_no = #{proNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP_CART( cart_no cartNo, user_id userId, pro_no proNo, cart_amount cartAmount, cart_Price cartprice) VALUES ( seq_cartNo.nextval, #{userId}, #{proNo}, #{cartAmount}, #{cartprice} )
